name: ANUA Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner
description: A soothing toner with 77% heartleaf that calms irritation, hydrates deeply, and helps balance the skin for a fresh, healthy feel.

name: BIODANCE Hydro Cera-Nol Real Deep Mask
description: A barrier-strengthening mask infused with Hydro Cera-Nol to soothe sensitive skin, lock in moisture, and leave a smooth, glowing finish.

name: ANUA PDRN Hyaluronic Acid Capsule 100 Serum
description: A hydrating serum with PDRN and hyaluronic capsules that boosts moisture, smooths texture, and gives skin a plump, radiant look.

name: COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
description: A lightweight essence with 96% snail mucin that hydrates, repairs damaged skin, and restores a natural, healthy glow.

name: ANUA Niacinamide 10% + TXA 4 Serum
description: A brightening serum with 10% niacinamide and TXA that fades dark spots, evens skin tone, and improves overall clarity.

name: LANEIGE Water Bank Aqua Essence
description: A refreshing gel essence that delivers long-lasting hydration while strengthening the moisture barrier for soft, balanced skin.

name: I'M FROM Rice Brightening Cream SPF50
description: A brightening mineral sunscreen with 41% rice extract that smooths dull skin while offering powerful SPF50+ PA++++ protection.

name: VT Cosmetics PDRN Care Spot Gel
description: A PDRN-infused spot gel that repairs damaged areas, boosts skin vitality, and enhances firmness and radiance.

name: BELIF The True Cream Aqua Bomb Eye
description: A hydrating eye cream with peptides and caffeine that reduces puffiness, softens fine lines, and brightens dark circles.

name: DR. JART+ Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Gel
description: A calming gel cream with Tiger Grass that reduces redness, soothes irritation, and cools sensitive, stressed skin.

name: SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cream
description: A centella-based cream that hydrates, tightens pores, brightens tone, and calms irritation with a refreshing finish.

name: MIXSOON Bean Essence
description: A gentle exfoliating essence with fermented bean extracts that smooths texture, hydrates, and improves skin clarity.

name: NUFRE Hyaluronic Peptide Serum
description: A peptide-rich serum that boosts elasticity, smooths fine lines, and deeply hydrates for firmer, healthier-looking skin.

name: PURITO Centella Unscented Sheet Mask
description: A soothing sheet mask with centella, squalane, and ceramides that calms sensitivity and strengthens the skin barrier.

name: Alpha Arbutin Brightening Serum
description: A brightening serum with alpha arbutin and vitamin C that fades dark spots, evens tone, and boosts natural radiance.

name: ROUND LAB Tea Tree Soothing Ampoule
description: A calming ampoule with tea tree that reduces blemishes, soothes irritation, and refreshes sensitive, troubled skin.

name: WELLAGE Real Hyaluronic Blue Ampoule
description: A deeply hydrating ampoule with multi-weight hyaluronic acids that delivers long-lasting moisture and smooth, plump skin.

name: BIODANCE Vita Niacinamide Gel Toner Pads
description: Brightening toner pads with niacinamide and fruit extracts that refine texture, hydrate, and enhance radiance.

name: ANUA Peach 77 Niacin Enriched Cream
description: A nourishing cream with 77% peach extract and niacinamide that hydrates, brightens, and leaves skin soft and healthy.

name: PURITO Azelaic Acid 10% Suspension
description: A clarifying serum with 10% azelaic acid and tea tree that reduces redness, smooths uneven tone, and fades acne marks.

name: DR.ALTHEA Bakuchiol Retinol Serum
description: A gentle retinol and bakuchiol serum that boosts elasticity, softens fine lines, and improves texture with minimal irritation.

name: Kaolin Bentonite Clay Purifying Mask
description: A purifying clay mask with kaolin and bentonite that absorbs excess oil, clears pores, and leaves skin fresh and detoxified.

name: Pure Squalane Oil
description: A lightweight squalane oil that hydrates, softens, and strengthens the skin barrier without feeling greasy.

name: Lactic Acid 5% Gentle Peel
description: A mild 5% lactic acid serum that gently exfoliates, smooths texture, and brightens dull skin with minimal irritation.

name: ANUA Tranexamic Acid Serum
description: A brightening serum with tranexamic acid that targets dark spots, reduces discoloration, and improves uneven skin tone.

name: ROUND LAB Caffeine Eye Serum
description: A lightweight caffeine eye serum that reduces puffiness, brightens tired under-eyes, and keeps the skin smooth and refreshed.

name: PURITO Propolis Ampoule
description: A hydrating ampoule with 83% propolis to nourish, smooth, and boost the skin's natural glow and resilience.

name: COSRX Mandelic Acid 8% Toner
description: A gentle mandelic acid toner that exfoliates dead skin, brightens dullness, and smooths uneven texture.

name: WELLAGE Marine Collagen Overnight Mask
description: An overnight mask with marine collagen that restores moisture, firms skin, and leaves it plump and radiant by morning.

name: BEAUTY OF JOSEON PHA Gentle Cleanser
description: A mild gel cleanser with plum water and PHA that removes impurities while keeping skin hydrated and soft.

name: ANUA Azelaic Acid 10 Hyaluron Serum
description: A soothing serum with 10% azelaic acid that reduces redness, hydrates, and improves uneven skin texture.

name: APLB Glutathione Niacinamide Cream
description: A nourishing cream with glutathione and niacinamide that brightens, hydrates, and improves the appearance of fine lines.
